original: Bernung, Carl Bernhard, sjökapten, rektor, Kalmar, f. 13/3/99 i Gbg av bogserb :befälh. Otto Berntson o. Gerda Börjesson. G. m. Edla Johannesson. Barn: Birgit Edla Louise f. 30, Runie Carl Bertil 32. — Stud:ex. i Gbg 18, inskr. v. Gbgs sjöm:hus o. t. sjöss i utkfart 18-31, styrmans- o. sjökapt:- ex. i Gbg 24, navig :lär :ex. i Sthlm 26. E. lär. v. navig :s’k. i Kalmar 30-31, tf. adj. v. navig :sk. i Gbg 31-32, tf. adij. v. navig:sk. i Härnösand 33-34, tf. lektor där 34-37, adj. v. navig :sk. i Gbg 37, rektor v. navig :s!k. i Kalmar is-ed. 45
translated: Bernung, Carl Bernhard, sea captain, principal, Kalmar, born on March 13th, 1899 in Gothenburg to the towage commander Otto Berntson and Gerda Börjesson. Married to Edla Johannesson. Children: Birgit Edla Louise born in 1930, Runie Carl Bertil born in 1932. He passed his final exams at Gothenburg in 1918, was registered at the Gothenburg Maritime House and sailed in the outbound traffic from 1918 to 1931, passed his mate's and captain's exams in Gothenburg in 1924 and navigation teacher's exam in Stockholm in 1926. He then worked as a navigation instructor at the Kalmar navigation school in 1930-1931, was a temporary deputy navigation school teacher in Gothenburg in 1931-1932, temporary assistant navigation school teacher in Härnösand in 1933-1934, temporary lecturer there in 1934-1937, assistant navigation school teacher in Gothenburg in 1937, and became a principal of the navigation school in Kalmar in 1945.
